item.title: Car Talk
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: What I learned today listening to NPR: The average family would save $1,000 per year by owning a Prius hybrid car. Ford is developing a hybrid SUV. Seattle is the worst city for driving and getting lost -- despite living here for more than seven years, my husband proves this fact. Wait, does that make it the "best" city for driving and getting lost?
